footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Constellations: Kujou Sara

fields.name: Crow's Eye (C1)
fields.value:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of Tengu Stormcall is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

fields.name: Dark Wings (C2)
fields.value: Unleashing Tengu Stormcall will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

fields.name: The War Within (C3)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Subjugation: Koukou Sendou by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Conclusive Proof (C4)
fields.value: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by Subjugation: Koukou Sendou is increased to 6.

fields.name: Spellsinger (C5)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Tengu Stormcall by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Sin of Pride (C6)
fields.value: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.
